(6:20) 5-D.McNabb pass to 81-T.Owens for 59 yards, TOUCHDOWN. Pass caught middle at the Dallas 45 before cutting upfield and down left sideline. It marked the 7th consecutive Monday night TD catch for Owens, setting a new Monday night record.
